Treasure.name: Treasure
Treasure.rules: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.

Clue.name: Clue
Clue.rules: {2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

Food.name: Food
Food.rules: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.

Blood.name: Blood
Blood.rules: {1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

Map.name: Map
Map.rules: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Powerstone.name: Powerstone
Powerstone.rules: {T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.
